content: happy jolly cowl materials 1 skein of lion brand wool ease thick and quick 95 yds were used any super bulky yarn of your choice will work needles us 13 9mm 16 circular then switched over to us 13 24 towards end as cowl got larger notions 3 stitch markers needle to weave in ends stitches k- knit p- purl yo- yarn over k2tog- knit 2 together tbl - through back loop m1l - make one left using tip of left needle lift bar between stitches from front to back knit this stitch tbl m1r - make one right using tip of left needle lift bar between stitches from back to front knit into front of stitch sm - slip marker pm - place marker gauge 10 stitches in 4 directions cast on 53 stitches - join in the round and place marker to indicate beginning of row * k1 p1* to end of row sm * p1 k1* to end of row sm repeat these two row for a total of 5 row row 1 purl to end of row sm row 2 k 26 m1r pm k1 pm m1l k26 sm 27+1+27=55 stitches total row 3 knit row 4 k 27 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k27 sm 28+1+28= 57 stitches total row 5 knit row 6 k 28 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k28 sm 29+1+29= 59 stitches total row 7 knit row 8 k29 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k29 sm 30+1+30= 61 stitches total row 9 p30 sm k1 sm p30 sm row 10 k30 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k30 sm 31+1+31= 63 stitches total row 11 knit row 12 k31 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k31 sm 32+1+32= 65 stitches total row 13 k2 k2tog *yo k2tog* to last 2 stitches before marker k2 sm k1 sm k2 *yo k2tog*to 2stitches before marker k2 row 14 k32 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k32 sm 33+1+33= 67 stitches total row 15 knit row 16 k33 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k33 sm 34+1+34= 69stitches total row 17 p34 sm k1 sm p34 sm row 18 k34 m1r sm k1 sm k34 sm 35+1+35= 71 stitches total row 19 knit row 20 k35 m1r sm k1 sm k35 sm 36+1+36= 73 stitches total row 21 k2 k2tog* yo k2tog * to 2 stitches before marker k2 sm k1 sm k2 *yo k2tog* to last 2 stitches k2 sm 73 stitches row 22 k36 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k36 sm 37+1+37=75 stitches total row 23 knit row 24 k37 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k37 sm 38+1+38=77 stitches total row 25 p38 sm k1 sm p38 sm border edge row 1 * k1 p1* to marker sm row 2 * p1 k1* to marker sm repeat row 1 and 2 total of 4 row completed bind off weave in ends stay warm and toasty enjoy happy holidays
